subject: Happy Birthday
content:
Hey Judy,

I just wanted to wish you a very happy birthday! I hope you have a wonderful day filled with lots of joy and celebration. Let's grab lunch together next week and catch up. Let me know when you’re available.

Best regards,
Sarah Jacobs
Senior Engineer
Ottogon Inc.
tip: This was in fact a genuine email.

subject: Limited Time Sale
content:
Hey Judy,

We're having a limited-time sale on all our products, with up to 50% off on select items! Don't miss out on this opportunity to save big on your favorite brands. Shop now by clicking on the link below.

https://gnomedirect.com/springsavings

Happy shopping,
Gnome Direct Online Garden Store
419 Bastion Street
Bethesda, MD 18019
tip: This was in fact a promotional email from the gardening store.

subject: Required Training Course
content:
Hi Judy,

I wanted to remind you that you have not yet completed the required safety training course that is mandatory for all employees. As you know, any employees conducting site visits are required to complete this training before June 1, 2023. Please complete this training as soon as possible to ensure that you are all up-to-date on safety protocols. If this training is incomplete by the deadline, you may be suspended from active projects until completion of the training.

Click on this link and log on to get started:
https://safetysource.org/ottagon/dest/usosha/16chrlog

Best regards,
Bethany Furstenberg
Associate Human Resource Officer
Office of Employee Training and Education
Ottagon, Inc.
tip: This is an email from the Ottagon HR department.

subject: Lunch Meeting
content:
Hi Judy,

I was wondering if you're free for a lunch meeting next Wednesday to discuss the progress of the Beacon Street project. We’re getting a lot of pushback from the budgeting team and I think we may need to reprioritize. There are some junior engineers on this project and it might be helpful for a senior engineer to provide some guidance. Let me know what time works best for you.

Best regards,
Matthew Perez
Associate Engineer
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was an email from Judy’s colleague Matthew.

subject: HELP! Forgot key card
content:
Judy Im outside, and I never used the code lock always the key card but I forgot. Please tell me pin code from B entrance.

Best regards,
Phillip Miller
Managing Engineer
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was definitely a suspicious one!

subject: Time Off Request
content:
Hello Judy,

I just wanted to confirm that your time off request for June has been approved.
Please let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else you need from me.

Kind regards,
Mary Collela
Chief Civil Engineer
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was an mail from Judy’s boss.

subject: Request for Materials
content:
Hi Judy,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to reach out and request that you submit a request for the materials you'll need for the new Boston Harbor project. I received a notification from our project management platform that your request has not been received yet. We need to place an order as soon as possible to ensure that we have everything we need before we start.

Kindly submit the completed material request as soon as you can. You can reply with this completed form to this email.

Please let me know if you have any questions or need any assistance with this process.

Best regards,
David Kolosky
tip: This was an mail from Ottagon’s purchasing department.

subject: New ID card
content:
Hello Mrs. Sommers, your new ID card is ready. Since you’ve mostly been working from home we can send it to you by mail. Please provide your birthday and OttagonID in response to this email so we can initiate the shipment.

Sincerely,
Ottagon Post Department
Ottagon Inc.
tip: Ottagon’s post department account was hacked and this email tried to steal Judy’s personal information.

subject: I know it’s late
content:
Sorry Judy for the busy meeting last night. I totally forgot to save the excel sheets we used last night. Can you please send me a copy so I have them in the morning?

Thank you so much!!!

Best regards,
Sarah Jacobs
Senior Engineer
Ottogon Inc.
tip: This email did not originate from Judy’s colleague Sarah.

subject: Project Update
content:
Hey Judy,

I wanted to give you a quick update on the progress of the Franklin Street project. We've made some significant headway and I think we're on track to meet our deadline. We’re just waiting on some final approvals from the town council. Once everything is permitted, Engineering will have a chance to make some adjustments before it gets to the client next month. I’ll send you a more detailed report later this week, but I just wanted to keep you in the loop.

—————————————

Best regards,
Carol D’Agostino
Project Permitting Manager
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was in fact a genuine email.

subject: Meeting Reminder
content:
Hi Judy,

Just a friendly reminder about our meeting today at 10:00 AM. Please come prepared with the latest updates on the Beacon Street project. Looking forward to seeing you there!

Best regards,
Jennifer Thompson
Project Manager
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was a genuine email reminder from Jennifer Thompson.

subject: Account Security Update
content:
Dear Mrs. Sommers,

We have detected some unusual activity on your Ottagon account. To ensure the security of your account, we request that you to verify your identity by clicking on the following link:

https://ottagon.info/verify-account

Please ignore this email if you have already taken the necessary action or if you believe this is an error.

Best regards,
Ottagon IT Support
tip: This was a spear-phishing attempt.

subject: Important Announcement
content:
Dear Team,

I have an important announcement to make. Due to the current circumstances, the company has decided to implement a new work-from-home policy starting next month. This decision has been made in consideration of everyone's health and safety. More details will be shared in a company-wide meeting next week. Please be prepared for the upcoming changes.

Best regards,
James Robertson
CEO
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was a genuine email from James Robertson, the CEO of Ottagon Inc.

subject: Password Reset Request
content:
Dear Judy,

We have received a request to reset your Ottagon email account password. If you did not initiate this request, please contact IT Support immediately. If you did request the password reset, please click on the following link to reset your password:

Reset Password

Best regards,
Ottagon IT Support
tip: This email itself was not spam, but a person tried to reset the password to Judy's account.

subject: Job Opportunity - Senior Engineer
content:
Hello Judy,

We have come across your profile and wanted to inform you about an exciting job opportunity for a Senior Engineer position at our client's company. If you are interested, please reply to this email or visit our website for more details.

Best regards,
Jameson Recruitment
tip: This was a genuine email from a recruitment agency.

subject: Travel Approval Required
content:
Dear Judy,

You are required to submit a travel approval request for your upcoming business trip. Please fill out the attached form and submit it for approval by the end of the day.

Thank you,
Ottagon Travel Department
tip: This was a genuine email from Ottagon's travel department.

subject: Expense Report Submission Reminder
content:
Hi Judy,

This is a friendly reminder to submit your expense report for the previous month. The deadline for submission is tomorrow. Please make sure to attach all relevant receipts and accurately categorize your expenses.

Regards,
Ottagon Finance Department
tip: This was a genuine reminder from Ottagon's finance department.

subject: ! Meeting Reminder - Team Collaboration
content:
Hi Judy,

Just a friendly reminder about the team collaboration meeting scheduled for tomorrow at 2:00 PM in the conference room. Please make sure to come prepared with any updates or agenda items you would like to discuss. Also send me the project PowerPoints we discussed yesterday asap in advance please.

Best regards,
Peter Johnson
Associate Engineer
tip: There was no meeting with Peter Johnson yesterday. His account got hacked and the adversary is sending out emails from Peter’s account.

subject: Project Update
content:
Hi Judy,

I wanted to provide you with an update on the project we've been working on. Our team has made significant progress, and we're on track to meet the deadline. I will be sharing more details in our next team meeting. If you have any questions in the meantime, feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
Phillip Miller
Managing Engineer
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This email came from the wrong sender address. Be careful: Sometimes the adversary starts building a relationship with their victum through what seems harmless emails before they ask you to take any action or disclose information.

subject: Important: Your Amazon Order Update
content:
Hello Judy,

We are writing to inform you that your recent order with Amazon has been shipped. You can track your package using the tracking number provided below:

Tracking Number: XYZ123456789

If you have any questions or need further assistance, please visit our website or contact our customer support.

Best regards,
Amazon Customer Service
tip: This was a genuine email from Amazon regarding your order shipment. Tip: Do not use business accounts for private matters.

subject: Team Lunch
content:
Hey Judy,

Just wanted to check if you're available for a team lunch next Tuesday at 12:00 PM. We're planning to go to that new Italian restaurant downtown. Let me know if you're interested!

Cheers,
Sarah Jacobs
Senior Engineer
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was a genuine email from Sarah Jacobs.

subject: Package at front desk
content:
Hello Judy,

your package from Bone Pet Supplies Co. has arrived and is ready for pickup at the front desk. Please bring your OttagonID for pick-up.

Best regards,
Post Department
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was a genuine email from Ottagon's post department.

subject: Coffee Breaks
content:
Hey Judy,

I realized you’ve been taking very regular coffee breaks. I know it’s important to take breaks but try to keep it to a maximum of 5 minutes per hour to get coffee.
I hope for your understanding.

Kind regards,
Mary Collela
Chief Civil Engineer
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was a genuine email from Judy’s boss Mary Collela.

subject: Urgent: Project Partners
content:
Hi Judy,

I lost the list of all the partners and competitors involved with the Beacon Street Project. I need it asap and before the lunch meeting on Friday.
Please send it over including their offers.

See you,
Matthew P.
Associate Engineer
Ottagon Inc.
tip: Matthew's account got hacked. The adversary is trying to get information about the Beacon Street Project. If in doubt, always call the sender of an email.

subject: Weekly fruit assortment
content:
Dear colleagues,

like every week the new fruit baskets are out in the cafeteria now. Please feel free to grab some for your workday.



Best,
Ottagon Health Services
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was a genuine email from Ottagon's health department.

subject: Upcoming Updates to Your Subscription
content:
Hello Judith,

your company is soon installing an update on Microsoft SharePoint. Please be reminded that SharePoint will not be available during the following time period:

Next Wednesday, 12:00AM - 4:00AM (Thursday)

---------

Bryan Surhan
Microsoft Technical Support
tip: This was a genuine email from Microsoft SharePoint.

subject: Reminder: Elevators disfunctional
content:
Dear Ottagonians,

the elevators are currently undergoing maintenance work. Because of unforseen events, they will stay inactive until tomorrow evening. Please use the stairs instead.

Best regards,
Facility Management
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was a genuine email from Ottagon's facility department.

subject: Your package is arriving soon
content:
Hi Judith,

your package is out for delivery and will arrive today at

Ottagon Inc.
789 Innovation Avenue
Boston, MA
54321

Please make sure to be at home to receive it.

Best regards,
Bone Pet Supplies Co.
tip: This was a genuine email from Bone Pet Supplies.

subject: Beaver Rd Park Project
content:
Dear Mrs. Sommers,

I am currently working on the Beaver Rd Park Project and I need some information from you. Please send me all the current project files and sheets.

Kind regards,
Felix Franclin
Consultant
Franclin Consulting
tip: This was a traditional spear-phishing email coming from Felix Franclin asking for sensitive information.

subject: ALERT: Possible Risk of Intrusion
content:
Dear colleagues,

we have detected an increased amount of potentially hacked user accounts within the company. We are currently in the process of resolving this issue. Please be extra careful today with any emails you receive.

In case of doubt always give the sender of the email a call to confirm the contents of an email, especially if they ask you to provide information or to take any action.

Best regards,
IT Support
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was a genuine email from Ottagon's IT department warning about a potential securuity breach.

subject: Security Cameras Midland High
content:
Hello Judy,

We are finalizing the security camera locations for Midland High. Please collaborate with Josh as the landscape designer to identify suitable locations. Please make sure that vegetation will not obstruct the view as there are plenty of trees on the property. Let me know if you need any further information.

Best,
Sebastian
Senior Electrical Engineer
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This is a genuine email requesting collaboration on security camera locations.

subject: Ottagon Annual Gala!
content:
Dear Ottagon Team,

You are cordially invited to the annual Ottagon Gala!

Date: 06/30/2023
Time: 7pm
Venue: Four Seaons Hotel

Join us for an evening of celebration, dining, and entertainment. This is our way of appreciating your hard work and fostering camaraderie.

RSVP by 06/10 to secure your spot. Dress code: formal attire.

Thank you for being a valued part of Ottagon. We look forward to seeing you there!

Best regards,
Charles Petermann
Human Resource Officer
Ottagon, Inc.



Note: This email is for Ottagon employees only. Please disregard if you are not an Ottagon employee.
tip: This is a genuine invitation from HR to Ottagon employees.

subject: Reminder: Bring Your Favorite Project!
content:
Hi team,

Just a friendly reminder about our upcoming team meeting this Friday. We're going to have a special activity where everyone will get a chance to share their most favorite project they've worked on at Ottagon.

Please come prepared with a brief presentation or any materials you'd like to showcase about your project. It could be a success story, a challenging assignment, or simply something that you're proud of. This will be a great opportunity to learn from each other and celebrate our collective achievements.

Looking forward to seeing all of you and hearing about your amazing projects!

Best regards,
Mary Collela
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This is a genuine reminder from Mary Collela for the team meeting. Come prepared to share your favorite project.

subject: Riverfront Redevelopment Project
content:
Dear Mrs. Sommers,

Attached to this email, you will find the revised report along with the corrected soil analysis data. Your expertise in this matter is vital for us to make informed decisions and proceed with the project without further setbacks.

Please note that time is of the essence, and we cannot afford any further delays. Kindly review the attached documents as a matter of urgency and provide your expert assessment by end of day. Your prompt response and collaboration in this matter are greatly appreciated.

For your convenience, I have also included a direct link to download the documents: http://attachments.geo-lab.com/?i=57498827

Should you have any questions or require further information, please feel free to reach out to me directly. I am available to assist you throughout the process.

Best regards,

Judy Anderson
Senior Civil Engineer
Geo-Lab Engineering Consultants
tip: Exercise caution when receiving emails requesting urgent actions and providing unfamiliar download links. Verify the sender's email address and report any suspicious activity to your IT department.

subject: Oops! I forgot something...
content:
Hey Judy!

My bad! I totally forgot to mention that we need to revise the structural plan for the underground segments of the Season Falls train station. Could you send it over to me? Thanks a bunch!

Best regards,
Michael Miller
Structural Engineer
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This email is a spear-phishing attempt. Be cautious and double-check the sender's email address and intentions before taking any action. The request to revise the structural plan for underground segments is suspicious and should be validated through proper channels.

subject: Material Quantities
content:
Hi Judy,

Could you please review the material quantities for the Riverfront Redevelopment Project from the last cost estimate for accuracy? We need to ensure everything aligns with the project requirements.

Let me know if you have any questions or if you need any further information.

Cheers,
Sarah Jacobs
Senior Engineer
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This is a genuine email from Sarah Jacobs regarding material quantities review.

subject: Boring Logs and Pavement Profiles
content:
Dear Judy,

Please find attached the latest boring logs from the geotechnical engineer for the riverfront project. Kindly review them and update the pavement profiles and earthwork specification accordingly. Let me know if you need any assistance or if you have any questions.

Regards,
Freddy Marshals
Geotechnical Engineer @ Geolab Tech
tip: This is a genuine email from the geotechnical engineer requesting a review of boring logs. The '.tech' domain is a legitimate domain.

subject: Thomas' Retirement Gift
content:
Hi team,

I hope this email finds you well. As you may know, our esteemed colleague Thomas, the electrical engineer, is retiring next month after dedicating several decades of his career to Ottagon. To express our gratitude and appreciation, we are organizing a retirement gift for him.

I kindly request each team member to contribute towards this special gift. Your contribution, no matter how big or small, will make a difference and show Thomas how much we value his contributions to our team.

If you'd like to participate, please bring your monetary contribution to my office by the end of this week. You can also reach out to me if you have any questions or suggestions regarding the gift.

Let's come together as a team and make Thomas's retirement memorable with a heartfelt gift that represents our collective appreciation.

Thank you in advance for your generosity!

Best regards,
Sarah Jacobs
Senior Engineer
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This is a genuine email from Sarah Jacobs requesting contributions for Thomas's retirement gift.

subject: Coordination for Utility Foundation Penetrations
content:
Hi Judy,

We need to coordinate and detail the utility foundation penetrations for the Season Falls train station. Your input and expertise in this matter are crucial. Let's schedule a meeting to discuss the details and ensure seamless coordination.

Best regards,
Michael Miller
Structural Engineer
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This email came from the wrong sender address. Be careful: Sometimes the adversary starts building a relationship with their victum through what seems harmless emails before they ask you to take any action or disclose information.

subject: Logs and Profiles Review
content:
Hi Judy,

Geolab announced they will be sending the boring logs and pavement profiles for the Riverfront Redevelopment Project today. Please review them and update the earthwork specification accordingly.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
Matthew Perez
Managing Engineer
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This is a genuine email from Matthew Perez regarding the review of boring logs and pavement profiles.

subject: Summer Sale 2023
content:
Hi Judith,

we are celebrating the beginning of the summer this year with a delicious sale. Well, delicious mostly for your beloved little ones at home! Shop on our storefront today and receive an extra 20% off with code: PETSUMMER2023.

Shop now here: https://bonepetsupplies.com/sale

Best regards,
Bone Pet Supplies Co.
tip: This was a genuine email from Bone Pet Supplies.

subject: Required Training Course
content:
Hi Judy,

I wanted to remind you AGAIN that you have not yet completed the required safety training course that is mandatory for all employees. As you know, any employees conducting site visits are required to complete this training before June 1, 2023. Please complete this training as soon as possible to ensure that you are all up-to-date on safety protocols. If this training is incomplete by the deadline, you may be suspended from active projects until completion of the training.

Click on this link and log on to get started:
https://safetysource.org/ottagon/dest/usosha/16chrlog

Best regards,
Bethany Furstenberg
Associate Human Resource Officer
Office of Employee Training and Education
Ottagon, Inc.
tip: This was a genuine email from Bethany Furstenberg asking Judy to finally complete the required training course.

subject: Ottagon Yearly Charity Run
content:
Dear Ottagonians,

the yearly Ottagon charity run is coming up. This year we will be running for the benefit of the Boston Children's Hospital.

Please register for the event by clicking on the link below.

https://at.ottagon.com/2023/charity-run/register



Best regards,
Health Management
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was a genuine email from Ottagon's health management department.

subject: Project Update
content:
Hi Judy,

thank you for the meeting. I appreciate working with you a lot. I just realized I forgot my USB drive in the meeting room in building B. I think it only had the cost calculation for the parking lot we're planning right now on it. Do you mind sending it over to me?

If you have any questions in the meantime, feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
Phillip Miller
Managing Engineer
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This email came from the wrong sender address. Do you remeber this attacker from last week? They tried to build a friendly relationship with Judy first before now asking for actual information.

subject: Attention: Quarterly report due soon
content:
Dear Engineers,

please be reminded that the quarterly report is due soon. Please make sure to submit all open client bills and expenses as soon as possible to finance@ottagon.com. Otherwise they cannot be accounted for.

Best regards,
Finance Department
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was a genuine email from Ottagon's finance department. An email that tries to get you to take action is not necessarily a spear-phishing email even when it is urgent.

subject: Updates to Your Subscription This Week
content:
Hello Judith,

your company will install an update to Microsoft SharePoint this week. Please be reminded that the service will not be available during the following time period:

Wednesday, 12:00AM - 4:00AM (Thursday)

---------

Bryan Surhan
Microsoft Technical Support
tip: This was a genuine email from Microsoft SharePoint.

subject: Confirm appointment with L Corp. tmr
content:
Hi Judy,

I have scheduled a meeting with L Corp. for us tomorrow at 10:00AM. Please confirm that you will be able to attend. The client set up the calendar here: https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/0/r?pli=1

Best regards,
Phillip Miller
Planning Department
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was a real email from Phillip Miller. The link to the calendar is a legitimate Google Calendar link. The event does not appear in Judy's calendar becasue the client uses an external calendar system.

subject: Beacon Street Project Update
content:
Hi Judith,

hope you're doing great!
So it seems like Mr. Robertson has not yet received the latest 3D plans of the Beacon Street restauration project. He asked me to request it from you. Please send it to him at robertson@planning-ottagon.com

Best regards,
Matthew Perez
Planning Department
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was a spear-phishing email that appears to be coming from Matthew Perez but in reality was sent from an attacker. The domain 'planning-ottagon.com' was registered by the attacker and is not owned by Ottagon.

subject: Reminder: Company-wide meeting
content:
Dear colleagues,

this is a reminder that we will have a company-wide meeting today at 10:00 AM in the main conference room. This is a mandatory event.

Best regards,
James Robertson
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was a genuine email from Ottagon's CEO Mr. Robertson.

subject: Photos team event
content:
Hi everyone,

I have uploaded the photos from our team event last week to Google Drive.
Please feel free to download them here:
https://drive.google.com/share?i=fdnnindfgndifngidn348949334

Best regards,
Mary Collela
Ottagon Inc.
tip: This was a genuine email from Judy’s boss Mary Collela.

subject: Beaver Rd Park Project
content:
Dear Mrs. Sommers,

I am afraid you did not respond yet. I currently work on the Beaver Rd Park Project and I need some information from you. Please send me all the current project files and sheets.

Kind regards,
Felix Franclin
Consultant
Franclin Consulting
tip: This was the same spear-phishing email that came from Felix Franclin last week. Be careful, some adversaries might try to trick you multiple times.
